description: Apply the provisions of the control bodies to prepare the manual and the traceability/traceability procedures
Identify the level of risk and the critical points to track and monitor

Evaluate the mandatory and optional information to be recorded relating to the entire production process and the product, in compliance with current legislation and in coherence with company standards
Identify unique logistics units and production batches that have undergone the same transformation process
Apply methods to measure the effectiveness of ICT processes
Use criteria to evaluate potential contraindications of changing ICT processes
Utilizzare una metodologia sistematica per valutare, progettare e implementare cambiamenti tecnologici finalizzati a benefici misurabili
